title: Post Game: Rick Scott and the Republican message for 2022
description: After exclusive interviews with White House Chief of Staff Ron Klain, New Jersey Governor Phil Murphy, and Republican Senator Rick Scott of Florida, Chuck sits down with John Reiss and Carrie Budoff Brown to discuss how the show was put together.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: After exclusive interviews with White House Chief of Staff Ron Klain, New Jersey Governor Phil Murphy, and Republican Senator Rick Scott of Florida, Chuck sits down with John Reiss and Carrie Budoff Brown to discuss how the show was put together.
